subject: Fashion
title: Athleisure Takes Over Menswear
description: A quick, practical guide to Athleisure Takes Over Menswear.

hook.text: In 2014, for the first time ever, Americans spent more on athletic wear than on denim jeans.

buildup.text: Yoga pants crossed from the gym to the grocery store. Sneakers showed up at boardrooms.

discovery.text: Athleisure wasn't lazy dressing. It reflected a culture that valued wellness over formality.

twist.text: Luxury brands noticed. Balenciaga released $900 sneakers. Gucci made $1,200 track pants.

climax.text: The line between sportswear and fashion dissolved. Comfort became the ultimate status symbol.

punchline.text: The gym won. The suit lost. Comfort is king.

quiz.question: What milestone did athletic wear reach in 2014?
options: It was banned from most corporate offices
The first athleisure-only fashion show debuted in Paris
Americans spent more on it than on denim jeans for the first time
